SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AllUserDetailsService
AllUserDetailsService is used to load user details from the database for Spring Security.
AppUser
AppUser is the entity class for the user entity.
AuthController
************************ Authentication Controller ************************ This controller is responsible for handling all authentication requests such as: - Login - Refreshing a token - Logging out - Registering a new user The controller uses the AuthService to handle the business logic for these requests.
AuthService
****************************** Auth Service ******************************* The authService handles all authentication business logic such as: - Login - Refreshing a token - Logging out - Registering a new user The service uses the JwtUtil to generate and validate JWT tokens.
CollabriumApplication
CollabriumApplication A project management application for teams.
CustomUserDetails
CustomUserDetails This class is used to provide the UserDetails for the Spring Security framework.
DatabaseSeederService
DatabaseSeederService is used to seed the database with initial data.
GlobalExceptionHandler
GlobalExceptionHandler is used to handle exceptions globally.
InvalidTokenException
InvalidTokenException This class is used to provide the exception for an invalid token.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
**************************** JwtAuthenticationFilter ********************************** This class is a filter that intercepts incoming requests and checks for a JWT token in the authorization header.
JwtUtil
Utility class for handling JWT tokens
LoginDTO
LoginDTO This class is used to provide the data transfer object for the login endpoint.
PublicController
PublicController This controller is used to provide public endpoints.
RequestRefreshTokenDTO
RequestRefreshTokenDTO This class is used to provide the data transfer object for the request refresh token endpoint.
Role
Role is the entity class for the role entity.
RoleRepository
RoleRepository is the repository interface for the role entity.
SecureController
SecureController This controller is used to provide secure endpoints.
SecurityConfig
Spring Security Config
TestConfig
TestConfig
TokenDTO
TokenDTO This class is used to provide the data transfer object for the token endpoint.
TokenExpiredException
TokenExpiredException This class is used to provide the exception for an expired token.
UserNotFoundException
UserNotFoundException This class is used to provide the exception for a user not found.
UserRegisterDTO
UserRegisterDTO This class is used to provide the data transfer object for the user registration endpoint.
UserRepository
UserRepository is the repository interface for the user entity.
UserRole
UserRole is the entity class for the user role entity.
UserRoleRepository
UserRoleRepository is the repository interface for the user role entity.
UserService
UserService is used to provide user services.
